page.title: 14OUR ROAD
page.content: There is a big field at the end of our road which is a park. All round the edge is a small track with miniature trains sometimes. On one side is a real track with trains which go under a bridge. There are tennis courts on the field and it is here that we have our annual bonfire, which is a large fire on the next field with stalls and fireworks. I have been to the bonfire each year since I was very young. Our road is quite busy but there are two busier roads at either end. There is a cottage in our road which is 117 years old. Four other houses in the road are the same type as ours. There are a lot of passages leading from our road but I don't know where they lead to yet for I have not long moved in.
